alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hernando; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Pinellas; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 29 at 3:15AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Citrus, Coastal Hernando, Coastal Hillsborough, Coastal Levy, Coastal Manatee, Coastal Pasco, Coastal Sarasota, Inland Citrus, Inland Hernando, Inland Hillsborough, Inland Levy, Inland Manatee, Inland Pasco, Inland Sarasota, Pinellas and Sumter. * WHEN...Through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical Storm Idalia is expected to strengthen into a hurricane and bring heavy rainfall to portions of west central Florida. The heaviest rainfall is expected tonight and Wednesday. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Hernando; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Pinellas; Sumter
